name: A SITE: DEFENSE_01
description: Standard A Site defense for A Main.

pieces.name: Camera
pieces.description: Camera high up so it can check deep into A main to give early info.

pieces.name: Trapwires
pieces.description: First wire for attackers entering site, second for anyone positioning towards the lever.

pieces.name: Cages
pieces.description: First cage is used to peek from left side of dice, second to protect while repositioning. Instead of the oneway lineup you can use a simple cage on the ground just outside of A main entrance.

pieces.name: Playstyle
pieces.description: Check cameras for attackers in A Main, then peek from left side of dice with A Main oneway, when exposed use second cage reposition and adapt.

name: A SITE: DEFENSE_02
description: Split A Site defense, A Main and Tree areas.

pieces.name: Camera
pieces.description: Lower camera to check into tree, but cannot see inside A Main.

pieces.name: A Main
pieces.description: Standard wire and cage to stop pushes.

pieces.name: Tree
pieces.description: Wire and oneway to shoot from site.

pieces.name: Playstyle
pieces.description: Check camera to see if attackers are coming from Tree, activate oneway and shoot behind the cages, beware of A Main, if there attackers there you can use the other cage to protect yourself.

name: A SITE: TREE
description: One way from garden to Tree, plus standard A Main defense for teammates..

pieces.name: A Site
pieces.description: Standard wire and cage for A Main.

pieces.name: Garden
pieces.description: High camera can check the feet of attackers coming from catwalk cubby into tree, very hard to spot.

pieces.name: Tree
pieces.description: Wire and oneway to shoot from garden.

pieces.name: Playstyle
pieces.description: Check camera, when spotting legs of enemies activate oneway and shoot, standing in the platform upstairs enemies from catwalk cubby cannot see you.
